title: "HSBC taps StanChart-backed AI startup for multi-year deal on financial crime"
excerpt: "HSBC has signed a deal with artificial intelligence startup Silent Eight to provide anti-financial crime technology for the bank. Following an initial trial period, HSBC will now integrate the technology within its existing infrastructure to investigate and resolve cases with greater speed,"
